name: Suman Dutta
about: Passionate for DevOps and Software Development. Graduated from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, India. Aiming to use my knowledge and strategies to solve real-world problems.

experience.title: Batched Cholesky Decomposition
experience.description: Worked under Prof. Soumyajit Dey in a team project on implementing the Batch Cholesky factorization in CUDA using single-precision arithmetic following a large number of optimizations. Batch matrix operations address the case of solving linear algebra problems for a very large number of very small matrices.• Devised an efficient tiled & batched implementation for obtaining the Cholesky factorization of a single matrix and for a set of small matrices, respectively.• Generated specific test data using MATLAB and conducted extensive experimental analysis by varying the i)Tiling, ii)Order of Looking, and iii)Chunk Size• Performed the experiments for various sets of matrices and determined the best set of parameters that proved to be ideal for executing the algorithm.• Concluded that the Top-looking Interleaved Chunked implementation of the algorithm (chunk size <= 1024/(tile size)^2) was giving the best performance.
experience.description_html: Worked under Prof. Soumyajit Dey in a team project on implementing the Batch Cholesky factorization in CUDA using single-precision arithmetic following a large number of optimizations. Batch matrix operations address the case of solving linear algebra problems for a very large number of very small matrices.• Devised an efficient tiled & batched implementation for obtaining the Cholesky factorization of a single matrix and for a set of small matrices, respectively.• Generated specific test data using MATLAB and conducted extensive experimental analysis by varying the i)Tiling, ii)Order of Looking, and iii)Chunk Size• Performed the experiments for various sets of matrices and determined the best set of parameters that proved to be ideal for executing the algorithm.• Concluded that the Top-looking Interleaved Chunked implementation of the algorithm (chunk size <= 1024/(tile size)^2) was giving the best performance.

experience.title: Volunteer
experience.description: Volunteer at National Service Scheme, campaigning in village regarding various social issues, collecting clothes and other daily needs and raising funds from IIT Kharagpur Campus and distributing the same to the needy in Village, mentoring school going students, working on improving the village school and schooling structure. Constructed a section of the village road during the NSS Annual Camp.Actively participated in plantation drives, blood donation drives and communitydevelopment program.Won Silver Medal(Unit 12) at NSS Annual Camp 2018, nominated as the Best Volunteer from the Unit, given certificates for Best Volunteer of the Unit on NSS Annual Day, recognized for noteworthy performance.
